column5: This is that time of year to give thanks.Thank you to all thats helped and has been concerned for my sake. I recently found out that my dear sweat sister in law was diagnosed for cancer  She is way too young to deal with this type of cancer. Dealing with mild treatments on biweekly increments, and what im going through. No thanksgiving this year for the first time in my life, for all of us. Theres always next year and her health is more important than a turkey diner. Have a great long weekend folks, and be greatful for what you have in your life.
Did know of this Vin.Sad to hear. Ah thanksgiving comes every year.Whats missing one.Im sure when alls well,the next will be grand. Best to your sis n law.

Sorry to hear that vinnimon. There is still alot to give thanks for, however. Turkey dinner is just turkey dinner, and family is way more important than anything.  My thoughts are with your family, in a good way!

My prayers go out to you and your Sister in law Vin.But you are so right.Be thankful for everything in your life, and dot take one thing for granted.When the storms of life rage, be thankful for who you are, and what you have to give Bud.  Paul
Dang sorry to here of this for her I hope she pulls through. The stores always have turkey so you can have it any time
My condolences and my best wishes Vinnie. Thanksgiving comes in many forms.
Two empty plates in Gods eyes will be filled for you's .          	Ron & Beverly D .
Thanks guys I know she will fight and win the battle for sure , she is a trooper indeed.

It's just a meal and an excuse for a day off!  Family is more then that! And you get to choose what days become Special to you, and celebrate those instead!  Forget the significance of the weekend and take everything one step at a time now. It sounds like she is an amazing person and that's all it takes to have HOPE on your side!  Who gives a rat's ass what Thanksgiving is anymore! Make your own Thanksgiving and make it count! That will mean more to your whole family then a date on a calendar!  All the best wishes are sent to you and your family!
Thanksgiving is meant to be observed every day of the year, Vin. It'll all work out for you and your family.
Give your thanks with her when she is feeling better
Happy Thanksgiving to you as well, Vince!!  Good luck to the sister-in-law in her battle.
Hey Vince - G and me are pullin for ya -  Best wishes for your sister in law. Take a break and get those 2 beauty girls of yours out for a fishing expedition
